Method Detail

split

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> split(java.lang.String delim,
                                                     java.lang.String string)
split roughly is the same as Java's String.split, without resorting to regex. I'll sometimes find it cumbersome to take regex syntax into account, especially in simpler cases where you don't need it.

Parameters:
delim - Delimiter to split by
string - subject to be splitted
Returns:

repeats a string n times

amount - amount to repeat
Returns:
